name: NDA Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Spiced Rum, Tonka Bean, Tobacco Flower..Fragrance Description: Close the door behind you and immerse yourself in the intoxicating warmth of this deeply sensual fragrance. The bold aroma of spiced rum mingles with the rich, exotic essence of tobacco flower, while a smooth, enveloping touch of vanilla bean adds a creamy, seductive finish. This scent is so captivating, it‚Äôs a tantalizing secret that‚Äôs impossible to keep...About the Fragrance: What happens here stays here, but first, you‚Äôll need to sign here. ¬†After years of meticulous crafting with the finest perfumers, the FORVR Mood Fine Fragrances collection has arrived. Explore four entirely distinct and unforgettable scents, each tailored to suit any mood‚Äîfrom irresistibly sweet and approachable to boldly assertive and unapologetic. Perfect for every individual, every day, and every occasion...About the Bottle: Self-care isn‚Äôt selfish. It‚Äôs a love letter to yourself that you write every day, sealed with a spray of your perfume. Like a precious diamond, these four fine fragrances reflect every one of your facets, from flirty and feminine to bold and unapologetic. These fragrances are encased in a stunning bottle reminiscent of Jackie‚Äôs engagement ring, and inspired by the brilliance of diamonds and the allure of precious gems.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_text: Love the FORVR MOOD perfumes. My favorites are NDA and Hard to Get. They bright, fresh and smell quite unique. This is my second bottle of NDA in less than a year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. If you value warmth, charm, and a lot of compliments, then this is the right one for you.

This is the one I wanted to most based on the notes , I went to Sephora to smell it and on the paper it smelled good nothing that gave me the ‚Äú oh my gawd I need ‚Äú affect . I sprayed it on my skin and it was bad on me it smelled like soap and even the Sephora employee said the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of new date night perfumesss üòçüíú I get so many compliments when I wear this. I love the sultry and bold vibe of this fragrance! It also pairs well with allot of my other perfumes as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this fragrance. The scent is divine, it has a nice vanilla scent that‚Äôs a bit more sophisticated. There is my current fave!
This is for the bold vanilla lovers! Sweet and slightly smoky scent that lingers on clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good! The floral notes are pretty but it has a spicy warm undertone that gives a beautiful contrast, I really like this scent, I will use it more as a night parfum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is pure mystery and allure in a bottle. The first spritz is like a sultry secret‚Äîbold and unapologetic. It has this warm, almost spicy undertone that feels so comforting yet daring, like it‚Äôs encouraging me to own every room I step into. There‚Äôs a sensuality to it that isn‚Äôt overpowering; it just lingers, leaving a soft, unforgettable impression. This is definitely my new ‚Äòsignature‚Äô for nights out and special moments I want to remember but keep to myself. üåπ‚ú® ‚ÄòWhat happens here, stays here‚Äô vibes, indeed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried FORVR Mood's NDA, and it‚Äôs quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. NDA has this alluring blend of fruity and floral notes with a hint of musk that feels like a perfect balance between sophisticated and playful.  The top notes are a mix of citrus and berry, which give it a bright, refreshing opening. Then, as it settles, you start to notice the floral middle notes ‚Äì soft but lush, making it feel elegant and feminine. What I love most is the warm base of vanilla and musk, which gives it a sensual finish that lingers beautifully on the skin.  The longevity is impressive, lasting most of the day with just a few spritzes, and the sillage is just right ‚Äì it‚Äôs noticeable without being overpowering. The packaging also feels luxurious and adds a stylish touch to any perfume collection.  If you‚Äôre looking for a fragrance that‚Äôs sophisticated with a hint of flirtatiousness, NDA is definitely worth trying. It‚Äôs versatile enough for both day and night wear, making it a perfect all-rounder for any occasion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it smells amazing. it is a captivating blend of fresh, floral, and warm notes that balance sophistication and subtlety. Its long-lasting scent makes it perfect for daily wear, adding a touch of elegance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sensual, floral scent! I wish I could spray everything with it! It is definitely one of my favs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite fragrances for date night!! It lasts all night and makes me feel so hot and beautiful. I love the spicy warm notes with the vanilla. This is a fragrance that layers so well with other vanilla scents and florals. Every time I wear it, I just know it's going to be a good night. It makes me feel like a powerful woman!

reviews.review_title: this is such a delightful fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: what I love most about this fragrance is it's not like everything that you smell typically. It is sultry yet still clean and smells expensive. I am glad I got this one and the I am her fragrance from the forever mood line, definitely give them a try!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of the 4 Forvr Mood fragrances, NDA is my absolute fave. I didn‚Äôt think I would like the tobacco flower in it but lawd I do! It makes it so unique, sexy and elegant. This is a powerful meeting, sexy date night kind of fragrance. It is one that I find I need to reapply every so often but I personally do not mind because I love freshly applying it. Can‚Äôt wait to buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is warm and sweet and layers well with other simple fragrances. I can smell it on my clothes days later but the scent doesn‚Äôt seem to last very long in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Really enjoy NDA. I get a ton of compliments and is very unisex. I was surprised at how long lasting it is! This is a win especially for the price point, IMO.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful fragrances, lasts well on clothes.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy purchase for me. Based on the notes I knew I‚Äôd like it but what I didn‚Äôt know was that I‚Äôd LOVE it! My nose may be broken but I swear this gives me tropical summer night vibes! I will be wearing this fragrance all summer long.

reviews.review_text: This fragrance is boozy and intoxicating.  When I first smelled it, I was immediately turned off by the initial spray.   However, as I walked throughout the mall and sniffed my wrist, I feel in love with love.   with this

reviews.review_text: Oh man I really really love the scents Ms. Jackie created they are so vibrant and juicy and the name‚Äôs definitely match the vibe. BUT they do not wear long throughout the day. Which would be my only critique.

reviews.review_text: Now this scent right here I absolutely love. It reminds me of Vera Wang Princess. It smells absolutely beautiful on. This is my favorite out of all of them. Only down side is it doesn‚Äôt last.

reviews.review_text: After purchasing another Forvr mood scent, I was slightly disappointed but came across NDA while in Sephora, and got a sniff.. I was immediately in love! It‚Äôs such a fresh yet inviting smell! Grab if you can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own over 200 fragrances and I don‚Äôt have anything like this one!  To my nose it‚Äôs cozy boozy and sexy!!  You need this one!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a sampler when the product first launched to see what this would smell like. When I sprayed it on one of those test strips I wasn't impressed but baby, this sprayed on the skin is amazing.  It is such a sexy and soft fragrance.I put this on when I want to feel like that b-tch. The one who draws attention wherever she goes.   Longevity is low to mid on the skin. If I apply at 7:30am it wanes on the skin by 12:30/1pm. It lasts longer on clothes. If longevity is a concern wear it for a date or a short-time occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy as it keeps selling out lol I had to grab it once available and I‚Äôm very happy I purchased because this scent is sexy and beautiful! I love the packaging. It looks so beautiful among my other perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells awesome. Too bad I didn't get a full bottle.

reviews.review_text: First impression‚Äîit‚Äôs a really pretty scent however, it doesn‚Äôt last and has zero projection on me. I tried them all and it‚Äôs like I didn‚Äôt put anything in at all within an hour. I‚Äôm just used to much stronger fragrances and like them to last.

reviews.review_text: This smells like Angel share with a sweeter finish. I'm not a vanilla person but I love how it's not overpowering but hums between your senses giving your nose a pec every now and then. I don't think this is like black opium

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So good! I love ForvrMood candles, so I grabbed 3/4 of their new perfumes, and NDA is definitely my favorite so far. I don't even know how to describe it, other than a flirty, musky, grown woman scent. It lasts great on my skin, and lasts a really long time on clothes. I'd definitely recommend trying out their sample pack or smelling these in person, but I ordered them blind and im super happy with my purchases. NDA is definitely one ill be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with all the smells  I purchased three out of the four  but this one is my favorite it smells so unique and amazing  I've already gotten compliments on it  however the one thing is the longevity is not as strong as I wanted to be at fades and it stays on you but it's faded  I bought to travel sizes because you would have to spray it a lot but because it smells so good I don't care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Surprised me. Heavier on vanilla than i expected in a pleasant way. Spiced heated vanilla vibes, very warm, sexy in an edible way. Not only is this my fav but it‚Äôs my partner‚Äôs fav for me to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was honestly expecting to like this fragrance the least out of the 4, but it turned out to be my favorite. Once you let it settle on the skin, it‚Äôs very sweet but also fresh and will be a good year round scent. It also lasts a long time on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised to find this perfume to be my go to scent. It‚Äôs long lasting and has this sweet yet sexy scent. I will buy again especially since it‚Äôs affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just because some people do not agree with a review does not mean it is not a true review! I DID NOT get anything free for my review and I absolutely love this scent . It is perfect for the cooler months . So to the people who want to say that people do not give an honest review for free stuff just keep scrolling .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells nice, like it‚Äôs a good gourmand scent but I find that atleast on me it just doesn‚Äôt have any long lasting power or projection and that makes me sad. So even tho I like it I will be returning.   it,i.would be opm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. It‚Äôs a grown and sexy night time or winter kind of fragrance. Not a lot of sillage so get a travel spray to take with you on the go. Definitely don‚Äôt recommend for summer.

reviews.review_title: Different But Somewhat Familiar, Doesn't Last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: On first spray, it really reminds me of Burberry Goddess. The dry down on this though is more spicy because of the Spiced Rum and Tobacco notes whereas Goddess has a more sweet, powdery dry down. I really like the uniqueness of the fragrance because you're not walking around smelling like every other person in the room. However, the lasting power is not that great and for that I dock a star.

reviews.review_title: Don't Walk Run... if you can still find her!

Jackie did something here <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very intoxicating. Perfect for date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It really surprised me because Tobacco is so strong normally but it plays a really good background to the rest of the notes. There‚Äôs a sultry sweetness  pops out. even though it has rum and tobacco flower. She‚Äôs sexy and soft at the same time. It lasts all day too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As I've stated on my other reviews ,I love Jackie but this line was not ready for the market!NDA is literally the story of my life.I'm the rich auntie that has a reservation and a lace set to match a little black dress.Granted,it's a very sexy scent it could easily be a dupe for Into the Night by Bath and Body !Considering I have a much larger bottle of a dupe scent for half the price is disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I both them all & this has got to be my favorite one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent and the layering on it. Originally wanted it for the color and to support, but after smelling it and letting it dry down, it was a must have!

reviews.review_text: Went to store the first day and they did not have in yet so I ordered NDA in the store on a blind buy. It came yesterday and I hate to say that I‚Äôm so disappointed . I really wanted to like it. It smells cheap and the faint smell does not last on the skin. I tried it more than once. It‚Äôs giving old cheap lady and im middle age and wear all types of perfumes

reviews.review_title: There she comes, there she goes

reviews.review_text: I was a little worry because I saw tobacco flower as a note BUT it gave me what I wanted from Tom Ford tobacco vanilla to smell like.  It‚Äôs a feminine musk tobacco that can easily be layered with vanillas, orchid or cashmere.  This is most definitely a date night smell.  I‚Äôm going to need a NDA for the things I want to do in this smell.  It‚Äôs given silk dress, heels, and a red lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for these perfumes, considering that Jackie is a perfume girl. The products don't match the level of sophistication she is trying to brand. If you‚Äôre a real fragrance head you can skip these, unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Sultry scent! It's the perfect scent for date night. I'm not a big floral person, BUT THIS is the perfect amount of floral and tobacco. I've been wearing it for about an hour, and I can still smell it on my wrist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying on this perfume, I wore it to an event in town and MULTIPLE potential boyfriends came up and asked for my number at the end of the night, there were MULTIPLE people asking me what I‚Äôm wearing and complimented on my perfume. And I still got it on the next day
